src.custom_calculations package

Submodules

src.custom_calculations.IDA_PL_Active_Direct module

src.custom_calculations.IDA_PL_Active_Direct.calculate_criterion(df, predict_module)

Calculate the criterion based on a condition for the input DataFrame.

Args: df (pd.DataFrame): Input DataFrame containing financial data. predict_module: Not used in the function.

Returns: pd.DataFrame: DataFrame with added ‘criterion_NbDirectApp_2M’ column.

src.custom_calculations.IDA_PL_Active_Direct.run(df)

Process the input DataFrame by creating a subset based on a condition and printing the number of rows.

Args: df (pd.DataFrame): Input DataFrame containing financial data.

Returns: pd.DataFrame: DataFrame with subset based on the condition.
